extension.name: Cloud Storage Field
extension.description: This field allows you to store your uploads on the cloud using Rackspace's Cloud Files product.

releases.release:
#### General changes - Tracking latest [PHP-Opencloud](https://github.com/rackspace/php-opencloud) release - Restore storing metadata about assets like the normal upload field
#### Rackspace Cloud Files - Store SSL, Streaming and HTTP versions of assets - Set the Rackspace timezone to mirror the Symphony timezone - Allow you to choose containers from different regions instead of being locked to Dallas
